document.full_text: y.e. yang of south korea used a hot start to reach the lead early in the second round of the masters, but rory mcilroy, leader for most of the first round, is back on top.
document.title: mcilroy leads in masters' second round
lines_and_colors: y.e. yang of south korea used a hot start to reach the lead early in the second round of the masters, but rory mcilroy, leader for most of the first round, is back on top.
